description:
Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La tactique de Magellan ! Le plan d`évasion compromis.
Magellan no Kisaku! Habamareta Datsugoku Keikaku
Magellan`s Tricky Move! A Foiled Escape Plan
План Магеллана! Преграда на пути побега!
マゼランの奇策! はばまれた脱獄計画
